grassmann::NotSquareMatrixException

grassmann::NotSquareMatrixException Class Reference

Exception raised when trying to compute the determinant or solving a linear system with a matrix that is not square. More...

Detailed Description

Exception raised when trying to compute the determinant or solving a linear system with a matrix that is not square.
